thread.title: Xamarin Dev Days are Coming to your City!
thread.title_full: Xamarin Dev Days are Coming to your City!

author: Jayme Singleton
title: Xamarin Dev Days are Coming to your City!
text:
Enterprise × Xamarin Dev Days are Coming to your City! By Jayme Singleton March 3, 2017 Events 
Last year, 136 Xamarin Dev Days were organized in more than 55 countries for over 9,500 developers worldwide thanks to community members like you! This year, we’re reaching farther to empower even more developers all over the globe, including towns and cities near you. What are Dev Days ? 
Xamarin Dev Days are community driven, hands-on learning experiences geared towards teaching beginner mobile developers how to build, test, and connect native iOS, Android, and Windows apps. 
Explore the power of mobile development with free training courses from Xamarin experts and local community members. Then, get the opportunity to put new knowledge into practice by building a cross-platform, cloud-connected app with Xamarin and Azure in Visual Studio to kick start your first mobile project. 
It’s just the beginning of 2017, but we’re excited to be able to announce the first round of events:
